snippet.title: SIMULACRA: Pipe Dreams - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
After downloading a mysterious free “bird game”, Teddy’s life further falls apart as he starts to experience memory loss and mood swings. It offered to take all his problems away, not knowing that it comes at a terrible price.

From the SIMULACRA universe, Pipe Dreams is a free-to-play spin-off that tells a completely new story along with a new cast while keeping the same horror phone simulator format.

Coming this Halloween on Steam, Android and iOS
